means: [医]西番莲属：美洲温暖地区的缠绕植物。有许多品种，如粉色西番莲(P. incarnata)曾以其镇静和止痛性能入药

sentence.Network_en: Floral buds of Passiflora edulis Sims were as explants in tissue culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 以紫果西番莲的花蕾为材料,进行组织培养愈伤组织诱导的研究.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 侵染西番莲属（passiflora）(Passiflora)植物的五个黄瓜花叶病毒分离物的特性比较黄瓜花叶病毒M株系RNA3的变异分析及全长克隆的构建黄瓜花叶 …

list.abs: study on antioxidation activity of passiflora incarnata extract西番莲叶抗氧化活性的研究
study on extraction of pectin from passiflora edulis rind with microwave - associated., 微波辅助提取西番莲果皮中果胶的研究.
study on the tissue culture of passiflora edulis紫果西番莲组织培养研究

mixed clarifying agent , which is made from gelatines , digallic acids and PVP , is added to the passiflora edulis juice . the test shows that the effect is good .采用明胶、丹宁酸和PVP制成的复合澄清剂，按一定比例添加到西番莲果汁中，经实验证明，效果较好。
